skill.name: Pair Programming
skill.description: AI-assisted pair programming with multiple modes (driver/navigator/switch), real-time verification, quality monitoring, and comprehensive testing. Supports TDD, debugging, refactoring, and learning sessions. Features automatic role switching, continuous code review, security scanning, and performance optimization with truth-score verification.
skill.summary: AI-assisted pair programming with multiple modes (driver/navigator/switch), real-time verification, ...
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill with no executable code, scripts, or network capabilities. Contains only markdown documentation describing CLI commands and configuration patterns for a legitimate development tool.

content.user_title: Collaborate with AI for Code Development
content.value_statement: Writing code alone slows you down and limits your learning. This skill enables AI-assisted pair programming with flexible driver-navigator roles, automatic testing, and continuous code review. You get real-time quality feedback while accelerating development and learning best practices.
actual_capabilities: Switch between Driver and Navigator modes for different collaboration styles
Run Test-Driven Development cycles with auto-generated tests
Receive real-time code review with security and performance analysis
Use automated role switching for knowledge sharing sessions
Generate test coverage reports and quality metrics
Debug issues with AI-assisted root cause analysis
limitations: Requires Claude Flow CLI installation to function
Only supports projects with command-line access
Does not integrate with all IDEs or editors
Quality depends on clear session objectives and human input

use_cases.title: Learn by Doing
use_cases.description: Work alongside AI to learn patterns, receive explanations, and build skills with guided feedback

use_cases.title: Accelerate Development
use_cases.description: Pair with AI for rapid prototyping, code reviews, and handling repetitive implementation tasks

use_cases.title: Improve Code Quality
use_cases.description: Run TDD sessions with automatic testing and continuous review to maintain high standards

prompt_templates.title: Start Session
prompt_templates.prompt: Start a pair programming session in [driver|navigator|switch|tdd|mentor|debug] mode to [implement feature|fix bug|learn pattern|refactor code]

prompt_templates.title: Generate Tests
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate comprehensive tests for the current code including edge cases and error scenarios

prompt_templates.title: Code Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the current code for security issues, performance problems, and style violations

prompt_templates.title: Debug Issue
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me debug this issue. Analyze the error, identify the root cause, and suggest a fix with explanation

output_examples.input: Start a TDD session to build a user authentication module
output: Ready for your first test case - describe what the authentication should do

best_practices: Define clear goals before starting a session
Choose the right mode for your task type
Run tests after each code change
Use verification to maintain quality standards

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for pair programming assistance

faq.question: What is the truth score?
faq.answer: Truth score measures code quality based on tests, coverage, and reviews. Scores above 0.95 are good

faq.question: Can I use this offline?
faq.answer: The skill requires Claude Flow CLI which needs internet for AI model access

faq.question: Is my code safe?
faq.answer: All processing happens locally. Code is only sent to configured AI endpoints based on your settings

faq.question: Why did my session disconnect?
faq.answer: Check network, reduce verification intensity, or use background session mode for long work

faq.question: How does this differ from coding alone?
faq.answer: AI provides real-time feedback, generates tests, reviews code, and explains decisions as you work
